directions: In a large saucepan or Dutch oven, combine the cubed ham, brown sugar, allspice, mango chutney, lime juice, peanut butter, raisins, chick peas, chili beans, and diced tomatoes with chilies. Cook over medium-high heat, stirring frequently, for 15 to 20 minutes, until thoroughly heated.
ingredients: 3 cups cooked ham, cut into one inch cubes
1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, rinsed and drained
1 (16 ounce) can chili beans in spicy sauce
2 (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
title: Casablanca Chili
